problem.markdown: For a simple compressible system at rest, which of the following are true? [ ] [mathjaxinline]T=(\frac{\partial u}{\partial v})_s[/mathjaxinline] [x] [mathjaxinline]T=(\frac{\partial u}{\partial s})_v[/mathjaxinline] [x] [mathjaxinline]p=-(\frac{\partial u}{\partial v})_s[/mathjaxinline] [ ] [mathjaxinline]p=-(\frac{\partial u}{\partial s})_v[/mathjaxinline]
problem.p: For a simple compressible system at rest, which of the following are true?
